transcript:
Customer: Mere Ram aayenge maa Sita sang aayenge, bhata Lakshman aur bhakt Hanuman.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Pradeep ji, ha ji sir India Mart ka app open ho gaya sir?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Thik hai ab na by lead wale page pe jaiye jaha pe by lead aapko daily basis pe aati hai.
Customer: Ha wo to bilkul chalu rakha abhi bhai thoda kam pe hu mai yaar.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha ji by lead wale page pe jaiye.
Customer: Ek minute ha abhi mai thoda kam pe hu mai aisa bol raha hu bhai.
Executive: Sir ek minute hi lagega sir please ready sir please subah se hum log do teen se connect kar rahe the ek minute me aapka kam ho jayega sir fir aap kam karte rahiye hum aapko disturb nahi karenge sir please.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai ha boliye.
Executive: Ha by lead page pe chale gaye na ab right side corner me dekhiye sir three dot hai sir waha pe click kariye.
Customer: Three dot.
Executive: Chalo kiya.
Executive: Ha ab niche se second hoga ya last hoga by lead preference us pe click kariye.
Customer: Kya by lead preference preference p r e f e r e n c e sir.
Customer: By lead preference.
Executive: Nahi nahi by lead preference preference ha ji.
Customer: Preference ho gaya.
Executive: Ha ji ha ji ha ji ha ji ek minute nahi nahi hua ha.
Customer: Aisa aaya hi nahi.
Executive: Search by lead short list lead ne.
Executive: Right corner me right top corner me three dot hai waha pe click kariye.
Customer: Kiya.
Executive: Ab upar se char panch line likhi hogi sabse niche dekhiye usme sir by lead preference likha hoga sir.
Customer: Likha hai na sir?
Customer: Nahi hai kuch.
Executive: Last doori.
Executive: Jaha pe aapki payment ho to aapko mai abhi video call me aisa ho to mujhe video call kijiye mai aapko screen share karta hu.
Customer: Kya sir?
Executive: Aapko screen share karta hu video call me kijiye mujhe.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai maine aap aap na three line pe left side me jo three line hai waha pe click kariye sir.
Customer: Are three line pe to click kiya hai bhai.
Executive: Ha waha pe click karenge na to niche dekhiye account ha ek ek jagah ek jagah ha.
Customer: Kya hai usme kya sir ek table customer support likha hoga sir customer support.
Customer: Customer support.
Executive: Ha customer support pe jaiye fir waha pe account manager aayega account manager pe click karenge fir share screen aayega screen now waha pe click karke karenge.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs help finding buylead preference option.



Resolution:

- Executive tried guiding customer to buylead preference.
- Executive offered screen sharing via video call.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Executive asked customer to do video call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, preference, account, support
